channel.title: Client Help - Windows 7 [FIXED]
channel.description:
Hi, I just bought a new comp and it runs Windows 7, I have a problem: When I run Client it says this: [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/9pq1io.png[/img] My Run.bat:
@echo off title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause
Help please. *Server is online 100% *I have JRE6 and reinstaled JAVA to JRE7 Still wont work.. *My VISTA computer can run it. Thanks. Hey just found how to get round this:
@echo off cls "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit pause
credits: pro banana

item.title: Client Help - Windows 7 [FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @Joseph69 Joseph69
item.description:
@Joseph69 wrote:

uh yeah , means your routers not on , or your internet not working happend to me just unplug your router plug back in and wait for your internet connecting to connect and then should start uo.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help - Windows 7 [FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @Hells-History Hells-History
item.description:
@Hells-History wrote:

Hi, I just bought a new comp and it runs Windows 7, I have a problem:
When I run Client it says this:

My Run.bat:

@echo off title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause

Help please.

*Server is online 100%
*I have JRE6 and reinstaled JAVA to JRE7 Still wont workâ€¦
*My VISTA computer can run it.

Thanks.

Hey just found how to get round this:

@echo off cls "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit pause

credits: pro banana

Read full topic
